item.title: US Stock ProPhase Labs Surges Over 35%, Market Cap Reaches $15.78 Million
item.description: On August 13th, according to data from Rockflow (https://rockflow.ai/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats), the U.S. medical technology company ProPhase Labs saw an intraday surge of over 35%, with its market value rising to $15.78 million. It had previously witnessed a pre-market trading surge of over 40%.ProPhase Labs announced on July 21st that it is conducting a reverse merger with a cryptocurrency-focused company and will commence holding Bitcoin as part of its new digital asset reserve strategy.

item.title: ETHZilla's price surges by 165%, reaching a market cap of $53 million
item.description: On August 13th, according to data from Rockflow (accessible via https://rockflow.ai/en/crypto-stocks?utm_campaign=blockBeats and targeted to _blank), the US stock's new ETH treasury company, ETHZilla, witnessed a significant expansion in the surge of its price by 165%, resulting in a market value reaching $53 million.Before this piece of news, billionaire Peter Thiel once again took a stance in Ethereum. Peter Thiel and his investment team acquired a 7.5% stake in the Ethereum treasury reserve company ETHZilla (formerly known as 180 Life Sciences Corp.).

item.title: Ethereum Breaks $4500, Sets New All-Time High in Current Bull Run
item.description: On August 13th, based on HTX market data, Ethereum exceeded $4500 and reached a new high in this bull market cycle, with a 24-hour increase of 4.76%.

item.title: The USDC Treasury burned 80 million USDC on the Ethereum chain.
item.description: On August 13th, as monitored by Whale Alert, the USDC Treasury burned 80 million USDC on the Ethereum blockchain.

item.title: Odin.fun has announced a trade suspension due to a suspected vulnerability.
item.description: On August 13th, the trading platform Odin.fun within the Bitcoin ecosystem announced the suspension of trading in order to verify the recent platform withdrawal activities and will keep users updated on the progress of the investigation.According to community feedback, the odin.fun platform seems to have encountered a vulnerability, with approximately 60 BTC being transferred abnormally.BlockBeats previously reported that on April 14th, the developer Bob Bodily of Odin.fun liquidated all assets on the Odin platform, suspected of being stolen. On that day, the platform suspended trading and withdrawals to determine the scope of the hacker's attack.

item.title: SharpLink's Ethereum Staking Balance Surpasses 600,000 Coins, with an Additional 5,226 Coins Staked One Hour Ago
item.description: On August 13th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, SharpLink (SBET) once more increased its holdings of ETH by 5,226 coins 1 hour ago, with a value of $23.1 million.SharpLink currently holds 604,026 ETH, which is worth $2.69 billion and ranks second among institutional holdings of Ethereum.

item.title: A new address withdrew 23,365 ETH from Kraken, worth $104 million
item.description: On August 13th, as per the monitoring of LookOnChain, a fresh wallet address '0x2A92' has withdrawn 23,365 ETH from Kraken within the past hour, with a value of $104 million.

item.title: Lending Protocol Spark Launches Season Two Reward Event, Season One SPK Rewards Now Available for Claim
item.description: August 13th. The lending protocol Spark launched the second season points event. The first season SPK rewards can now be claimed. The second season points event will continue until December 12th.

item.title: US Stock Market Continues to Rise, New ETH Treasury Company ETHZilla Surges Over 146% Intraday
item.description: On August 13th, according to RockFlow market data, there was a broad rally in the US stock market. The Nasdaq and the Dow rose more than 1% intra-day, and the S&P 500 Index increased by 0.86%.The new ETH treasury company ETHZilla (ATNF) saw a surge of over 146% during the day. The stock price is currently at $8.03, indicating a market capitalization of approximately $48 million. It is worth noting that today's ETHZilla intra-day trading volume has exceeded $689 million.In earlier news, billionaire Peter Thiel once again took a position in Ethereum. Peter Thiel and his investment team acquired a 7.5% stake in the Ethereum treasury reserve company ETHZilla (formerly 180 Life Sciences Corp.).

item.title: SlowMist: The Qubic-controlled Monero mining power ratio is still questionable and difficult to prove
item.description: August 13th: Di Xie, the founder of SlowMist, commented on the Monero 51% attack incident. He pointed out that there are many doubts in the community regarding whether it is truly a 51% attack in essence. However, there is no doubt about block reorganization (such as 6 blocks). The Qubic mining pool claims to control 51% of the hash power, but many community members believe that they control approximately 33% of the hash power. This controversy is not easy to verify. To prove a 51% attack decisively, a double-spending attack test must be carried out.Previously reported, through the "useful Proof of Work (uPoW)" mechanism, Sergey Ivancheglo, the co-founder of IOTA, quickly accumulated a large amount of Monero hash power in his project Qubic. On August 12th, Qubic briefly controlled 52.72% of the Monero network's hash rate (approximately 3.01 GH/s). Once exceeding 51%, Qubic could reject blocks from other pools, resulting in chain reorganization, double-spending, or transaction censors
